How do contemporary societies in general, and the criminal justice system in particular, deal with the problem of crime and disorder? This course aims to answer these questions and more about our understanding on how criminals and crimes are being viewed in our society. The students will be acquainted with the criminal justice policy perspectives on crime and punishment and how best to respond to and reduce the problem of crime in contemporary societies.
title: Crime and Criminality: A Multidisciplinary Perspective
